title: CR-048 Post-Approval Verification Failure - CI Not Verified Before Merge

comment:
PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE - RECOMMEND FOR APPROVAL

**Frontmatter Verification:**
- title: 'CR-048 Post-Approval Verification Failure - CI Not Verified Before Merge' - VERIFIED
- revision_summary: 'Consolidated CAPA-001 through CAPA-003 into single corrective action; renumbered preventive CAPAs' - VERIFIED (N/A for v0.x per SOP-001, but present and descriptive)

**SOP-003 Section 5 Compliance:**
- Section 1 Purpose: Present, clearly states deviation being investigated
- Section 2 Scope: Present with Context, Deviation Type (Procedural), Systems/Documents Affected
- Section 3 Background: Present with Expected Behavior, Actual Behavior, Discovery, Timeline
- Section 4 Description of Deviation(s): Present with 5 deviations, Facts and Evidence subsections
- Section 5 Impact Assessment: Present with Systems, Documents, Other impacts
- Section 6 Root Cause Analysis: Present with Contributing Factors, Primary/Secondary/Tertiary causes
- Section 7 Remediation Plan: Present with 5 CAPAs (1 corrective, 4 preventive)
- Sections 8-10: Present with appropriate pre-execution placeholders

**Placeholder Content Check:**
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-6)
- Execution placeholders in Sections 7-9 appropriate for pre-execution status per SOP-003

**Root Cause Analysis Assessment:**
- Appropriately identifies systemic procedural gap (No Automated Enforcement)
- Distinguishes contributing factors from root causes
- Primary root cause addresses fundamental process deficiency

**CAPA Assessment per SOP-003 Section 6:**
- CAPA-001 (Corrective): Remedies immediate deviation - appropriate
- CAPA-002-005 (Preventive): Address root causes (CI config, merge gates, review checklist, test scope) - appropriate
- All CAPAs address identified root causes

**Cross-Reference Verification:**
- SDLC-QMS-RTM v8.0 Section 6.1 confirmed to contain 'Commit: TBD' at line 1399 - deviation claim VERIFIED

**Typos/Errors:** None found
**Formatting:** Consistent throughout

RECOMMENDATION: Approve for pre-execution
